CatDescriptText: Related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 13, 1965, pg. 7 reads: "King and Queen of the D.I.'s Mardi Gras Ball were chosen for their community as well as foreign activities. The king was Dr. H. Raymond Primas and the queen was Mrs. Edward Hale. - Harris Photo"
TitMainTitle: Dr. H. Raymond Primas and Barbara Hale, wearing king and queen costumes, walking as a couple with other costumed pairs on dance floor, including Beatrice hall wearing sequined gloves and jacket, in the Golden Ballroom of the Hilton Hotel for the D.I.'s Mardi Gras Ball
